'International Federation of Surveyors' ('FIG', FÃ©dÃ©ration Internationale des
GÃ©omÃ¨tres) is the UN-
recognized [http://unterm.un.org/dgaacs/unterm.nsf/0/7569867c46aec55d852569-
fa0000705a?OpenDocument UNTERM entry] (United Nations Multilingual Terminology
Database) global organization for the profession of surveying and related
disciplines. It was established in 1878, [http://www.fig.net/hsm/overview.htm International Institution for
the History of Surveying and Measurement - Site overview], FIG and formed
as a legal entity in
1999. [http://www.fig.net/annual_review/anrew99/Annual%20Review%2099.pdf
Annual Review 2000], page 3. FIG.  FIG has 106 member associations from 88
countries.
